devdoc.author: Aaron Boyd <https://github.com/aaronmboyd>
devdoc.details: This contract is a special version of a      UBIBeneficiary that additionally sweeps      cUSD to a known custodian address

returns._0: uint256 authorization balance for this contract

params._txId: Dynamic string txId of the transaction to authorize

returns._0: uint256 usable balance for this contract

deauthorize(string).details: We don't need to specify the transaction size here because it is stored in the Authorization struct

params._txId: Dynamic string txId of the transaction to de-authorize

params._key: Map key of the Authorization to return

getAuthorizationKeys().details: Note this is marked external, you cannot return dynamically sized data target is a Web3 caller for iterating Authorizations

params._key: Map key of the Settlement to return

getSettlementKeys().details: Note this is marked external, you cannot return dynamically sized data target is a Web3 caller for iterating Settlements

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

settle(string,uint256,address).details: If there was an existing authorization for this txId, de-authorize it, for the original authorization amount, regardless of the current settlement amount

params._reconciliationAccount: Reconciliation account to send the cUSD to during settlement
params._txId: Dynamic string txId of the transaction to authorize

transferOwner(address).details: Adding transferOwner to facade implementation of UBIBeneficiary.transferOwnership from an interface object

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Celo UBI reconciliation contract

SettlementEvent(bytes32,address,string,u.notice: Triggered when an amount has been settled for a user
